abstract.text: Creates an app intent parameter with a list of selectable options.

inlineContent.text: A word or short phrase summarizing this parameter.
A prompt that asks a person to provide the parameter value.
An enum that indicates how this parameter receives the output from a preceding app intent.
An object that determines selectable options for this parameter.

abstract.text: Make your app’s content and actions discoverable with system experiences like Spotlight, widgets, and enhanced action capabilities of Siri, powered by Apple Intelligence.
An interface for providing a dynamic list of options for a parameter of your app intent.
Describes the input behaviors for connecting a parameter to the output of the previous App Intent.
The text you want the system to display, or speak, when requesting a value, asking for
A property wrapper that indicates the associated property is an input argument of the app intent.
Creates an app intent parameter with a default unit for the measurement.
Creates an app intent parameter with a default unit for the measurement.
Creates an app intent parameter that specifies the unit for the measurement.
Creates an app intent parameter that specifies the unit for the measurement.
Creates an app intent parameter with a list of selectable options.
Creates an app intent parameter with a list of selectable options that can convert the selected value.
A unit of measure for length.
A numeric quantity labeled with a unit of measure, with support for unit conversion and unit-aware calculations.
A reference to a localizable string, accessible from another process.
